text: Hong Kong Guide () is a Hong Kong atlas published by the Survey and Mapping Office (SMO), Lands Department of Hong Kong Government.Lands Department: Hong Kong Guide 2014 edition available for Sale From 2005, Hong Kong Guide 2005 includes photomaps in parallel to traditional maps.Lands Department: Hong Kong Guide 2005 (Photomap Edition) Available for Sale ==References== Category:Mass media in Hong Kong Category:Tourism in Hong Kong
title: Hong Kong Guide
